overview: Zoe Britton is one of the most sought after porn starlets in the business today! Everyone wants to get a piece of her! However, Zoe Britton has a special place in her heart for other women. And this effort by Abigail Productions showcases Zoe and some of her closest friends cutting loose and getting it on together! We know you love Zoe Britton, but don't miss her playing with starlets like Taylor Vixen, Nikki Rhodes, Alyssa Reece, Karlie Montana and Natasha Nice! It's Zoe time!
title: Lesbian Spotlight: Zoe Britton
